trans-unit.source: Read the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated%2A> property in an event handler to determine whether the sign-out was initiated by the IP (a sign-out clean-up request message was received by the RP), or whether the sign-out was initiated by the relying party (RP).
trans-unit.target: Leitura de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated%2A>propriedade em um manipulador de eventos para determinar se o logout foi iniciado pelo IP (foi recebida uma mensagem de solicitação de limpeza de logout, o RP), ou se o logout foi iniciado pela terceira parte confiável (RP).</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs"></xref> class by using a value that specifies whether sign-out was requested by the identity provider (IP).
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs"> </xref> classe usando um valor que especifica se logout foi solicitado pelo provedor de identidade (IP).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated%2A> property is set to the value of the `isIPInitiated` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated%2A>propriedade é definida como o valor de `isIPInitiated` parâmetro.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if sign-out was requested by the IP; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a saída foi solicitada por IP; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs"></xref> that indicates sign-out was initiated by the identity provider (IP).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs"> </xref> que indica o logout foi iniciado pelo provedor de identidade (IP).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs"></xref> that has its <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated*> property set <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs"> </xref> que tem seu <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated*>conjunto de propriedades <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether sign-out was initiated by the identity provider (IP) via a WS-Federation sign-out clean-up message (“wsignoutcleanup1.0”).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se logout foi iniciado pelo provedor de identidade (IP) por meio de uma mensagem de limpeza logout do WS-Federation ("wsignoutcleanup&1;.0").

trans-unit.source: In an event handler, you can use the IsIPInitiated property to determine whether the sign-out was initiated by the IP (a sign-out clean-up request message was received by the RP), or whether the sign-out was initiated by the relying party (RP).
trans-unit.target: Em um manipulador de eventos, você pode usar a propriedade IsIPInitiated para determinar se o logout foi iniciado pelo IP (foi recebida uma mensagem de solicitação de limpeza de logout, o RP), ou se o logout foi iniciado pela terceira parte confiável (RP).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if sign-out was initiated by the IP; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a saída foi iniciado por IP; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs"></xref> that indicates sign-out was initiated by the relying party (RP).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs"> </xref> que indica o logout foi iniciado pela terceira parte confiável (RP).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs"></xref> that has its <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated*> property set <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs"> </xref> que tem seu <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated*>conjunto de propriedades <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated*>
